title: COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 3353/93 of 22 November 1993 fixing the guide prices for the fishery products listed in Annex I (A), (D) and (E) to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 for the 1994 fishing year
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 3353/93 of 22 November 1993 fixing the guide prices for the fishery products listed in Annex I (A), (D) and (E) to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 for the 1994 fishing year
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The guide prices for the fishing year from 1 January to 31 December 1994 for the products listed in Annex I (A), (D) and (E) to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 and the commercial categories to which they relate are fixed in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 November 1993.
For the Council
The President
A. BOURGEOIS
(1) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 1891/93 (OJ No L 172, 15. 7. 1993, p. 1).
ANNEX
